interactivity.requirements: Not Monday 15 Tsuneyo Affection You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen " Seeds " from Tsuneyo Tojo

progression.synopsis: Molly is making a reluctant Tsuneyo try on a costume, and wants Sensei 's opinion. They are planning to do a cosplay photoshoot for the manga club, which Tsuneyo is apparently joining. Tsuneyo isn't enjoying it very much (especially when Molly takes a hands-on approach to checking how tight the costume is), and doesn't think she'll look any good, but she changes her mind when she sees a photo of herself.
trivia: The characters whom Molly and Tsuneyo are planning to cosplay are from the anime Puella Magi Madoka Magica .

The curse Molly uses ("Go ndéana an diabhal dréimire de cnámh do dhroma ag piocadh úll i ngairdín Ifrinn") is an Irish phrase meaning "May the devil make a ladder of your backbones while picking apples in the garden of hell".

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.13p2.
